Text:
i hope the AR is alright with this movie.. & i agree about OEM group... btw.. downtyu.. had a question in mind.. we have a HDDVD of Pan's Labyrinth in 720p... & bluray in 1080p... bluray will look better than the HDDVD right?

if yes... then please see if you can upload the Bluray 720p. if not.. then i will go for the HDDVD

lol, the aspect ratio is correct, but it isn't technically 720p (should be 1200*720). this is better than the repack tho!

@abhikrit. There is no difference in quality between HDDVD and blu-ray.

Hey could you upload some blu-ray rips of The Polar Express and Bad Santa in 1080p?

1920*1080?

There is an annoying background noise throughout all the movie. 

Is this the repack release?
